set.name: DMD-12 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Oracle

property.name: Race
property.value: God Nova

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if this creature is linked, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Your opponent puts it on the bottom of its owner's deck. If this creature isn't linked, choose one of your opponent's creatures and destroy it. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {LEFT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Right God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.) ■ While this creature is linked, this creature breaks an additional shield.

The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.) ■ While this creature is linked, this creature breaks an additional shield.

card.name: New Wave, End of the Century

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your colorless creatures. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever one of your creatures would be destroyed, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ Whenever one of your shields would be broken, choose one of your opponent's shields. This creature breaks that shield.
